name: uikit
title: UIkit
description: UIkit is a lightweight and modular front-end framework for developing fast and powerful web interfaces.

scripts.compile-less: mkdir dist & mkdir dist/css & npm run images && npm run compile-less-core && npm run compile-less-theme && node build/less && node build/css-minify
scripts.compile-rtl: npm run images && node build/rtl-before && npm run compile-less && node build/rtl-after
scripts.compile: npm run compile-less && npm run compile-js
